website_summaries.verdict: A light leave-in conditioner that packs a big punch. Your best bet if you have very unruly hair.
pros: Tames static and frizz, leaving hair soft and smooth
Lightweight and doesn't leave residue in your hair
cons: Some users have complained about the pump clogging up

customer_reviews.title: It’s a 10 is great!! This is NOT Its a 10.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Its a 10 for years now. It’s an amazing product that makes my hair shiny and soft. This is NOT It a 10!! I received this product a few weeks. After I started using this, my hair was dry, dull, and unmanageable. I thought it was the humidity of the summer. Yesterday I finally made the connection that maybe it was a knock off product. I had a little left of the Its a 10 I bought from Target and used it this morning. My hair immediately went back to its soft and shiny self. Buy Its a 10, just not from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: WHAT HAVE YOU DONE???
customer_reviews.text: I used to LOVE this product. It was amazing in my fine, color-treated wavy hair, light yet protective and nourishing. I finally ran out of my last bottle and bought a replacement... this stuff is GARBAGE. It has a nauseating flowery scent and is just like every other garbage product on the market now, it coats my hair in this sticky, heavy layer. My hair looks dirty when it is clean and is heavy and lanky instead of voluminous and healthy. I'm super upset about it. Clearly somebody wanted to cut costs and now your customers are getting shafted. Boo, booooooo!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lynn Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Item.
customer_reviews.text: This item is fake. I've been using the real deal for years and the smell and quality of this is not comparable. It works okay but the real stuff is amazing. I knew the price was too good to be true! I should have known when it came with a fake tape seal on it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: For taming frizzy hair ... THE BEST PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I was a hair designer for 15 years about 30 years ago and have used and tried MANY products then and now! ... I still have curly frizzy hair and live in Florida... I have tried sooo many products to calm my frizz in humid hot weather and this totally was the best ever!.. I Highly recommend it if you want to tame your hair and get the most curl out of it.. I LOVE IT> thank you for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this product every time I wash my hair. I'm not sure what's so great about it. I thought it's suppose to strengthen the hair, detangler, make shine and all that jazz. I have long hair so detangler is something I look for. This product doesn't really detangle. It doesn't really add shine. Sometimes my hair feels fake from it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki D.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order this!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not the same as Ulta. It is so thick it will not even spray. I spent a ton to get the big bottle. It doesn’t work nor is it the right consistency.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Watered Down Product
customer_reviews.text: I compared this to a bottle I purchased at Nordstrom Rack, both brand new never actually used on my hair. You will see that the Amazon product is not as thick. They do smell the same so I am guessing the Amazon product is simply watered down. The bottle/packaging seems to be exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Malet

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I saw all of these amazing reviews. I used this product for about a month and noticed my very normally healthy, strong, blonde hair start breaking off two inches long! I have not had issues before with breakage, I have very strong healthy hair but since using this product my hair has been so dry. I’m very disappointed. Amazon shouldn’t sell things that are not real products!
customer_reviews.author: David Rose

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works to smooth and calm frizz. I've used it for years and now my daughter is having success with it as well. She has thick, coarse, straight hair with curly frizz. Don't use too much or it will make your hair look oily. Sometimes I spray it into my hand first, blend it a little and then put it on the hair for a more even and specific application.
customer_reviews.author: LiveFreeInHim

customer_reviews.title: Nice product... Shipping disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Use this product all the time, everyone in my house does. But I guess when you ask for a replacement you may not get it.... I'm stuck with an empty bottle and a spoon to apply what is left in the envelope 😡
customer_reviews.author: Cynde

customer_reviews.title: Not the real 10 FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product. I've used it for many years. Just this week tried the product I bought on here and it definitely isn't the same product of 10 I have been using for many years. So I found a little travel bottle I have and compared them. Could get a comb right through hair and with the other bottle from here it did nothing at all was like using nothing at all. NOT THE REAL THING
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: It was as if this was a recycled bottle. The product smelled like the store bought but doesn't really work the same. It's been 2 months now and when you pump it the stuff comes out the sides of the top of the cap! (Hard to explain but very annoying to say the least!) I should have read all the reviews before purchasing. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived broken and had leaked...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with top broken off and had leaked all over inside of package making quite the mess to take care of. Bottle top broke clean off and could not be fixed. Bottle could not be used. Had to take what product was salvageable and put into another container. Am not able to return for replacement.Also, noticed this is NOT the same as what I have bought from my salon. Will NOT buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Originally gave this a 4 star rating because it leaked as the top was not on tight. Now that I've used it for a while, it's terrible. It's sooooo thick that it plugs up the spray bottle! I've bought this several times from Amazon, but I probably won't ever again! Have never had this problem before. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LovesLabs

customer_reviews.title: it's a 10
customer_reviews.text: it's a 10-hair product is one of the best solutions for untangling hair, protecting against heat (blow dryer, straightener, curling iron, etc.) and breakage. I started using it's a 10 a few years ago because my hair was short, damaged and dry. Since using it's a 10 my hair has grown to become pretty healthy, so I would recommend this product based off of my use and results I received. I will add that normally I have been able to purchase this product in this size at my local store but since they have been out of stock, I found this one, and it's at a much better value too!
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Porter

customer_reviews.title: Not genuine product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product 4 times a week. I have ordered this product every time I run out because it is so good for my long, thick hair, but this particular bottle is not the real stuff. I don’t know if someone returned this bottle after they diluted it or changed out the product completely. I don’t think this supplier would risk losing business intentionally. All I know for sure is it is not feeling silky on my hair and definitely not detangling like many times before. I am using more of this product than I normally would and it is still not working like I know it should.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Great - but dont use too much
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for damaged and dry brittle hair. I have been trying to recover my hair from constantly bleaching. When I first used the product, I put a ton of pumps into my hair (I have medium long hair) and noticed I cant be as generous with this product as I am with some other products I use. When you apply too much, your hair will dry, but have a greasey or sticky feel. It definetly doesnt LOOK greasey, but I cant run my fingers through it because of the added oils. Maybe thats a flaw in the product, or maybe I need to chill with applying ten pumps of hair product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I have lots of long and thick hair! I apply heat to my hair about 4-5 times a week and I finally went in to see my hairdresser and she suggested this product because I had damaged my hair underneath. I use it as soon as I get out of the shower and I towel dry and then I make sure to flip my hair over to really get the product where my hair is damaged the most. I also apply before I use any kind of heat. I've noticed such a difference in the past two months that I have been using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, awful package.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is incredible. My hair has never been easier to brush. That's the only reason I keep paying so much. It's really miraculous. However, when I received this, tons of the product was in the package. I'm so upset.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I don't think this is a real ""it's a 10" product after buying.  Beware.
customer_reviews.text: I believe this item to be Fake.... the smell is off.... left my hair oily and sticky feeling. Item arrived by "pharmapacks". If there was a real it's a 10 product in the bottle it's been altered or watered down with cheap conditioner maybe?... So disappointed and it just doesn't smell the same. The real deal never left my hair like this.
customer_reviews.author: M minor

customer_reviews.title: This product was not what it normally is!! BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I buy the normal one form beauty supply stores, have for years, thought I would save some money this way and this stuff made my hair break more, it was frizzy, didn't smell the same as usual, and made my extensions brighter? DONT RECOMMEND AT ALL this was a fake vendor or whatever they put in this stuff was not at all what it is supposed to be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE! Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: FAKE! I knew the low price was too good to be true. I have been using It’s A 10 for years. This is not the real deal! The bottle is a matte finish (not as pictured). I thought maybe the company was using new packaging. I can’t find any evidence of that on their website. But the real give away is the smell. I compared my almost empty (real) bottle to the new one. They smell completely different. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I bleach my hair, I am naturally dirty blonde. I now have platinum blonde hair. But, I’ve had mocha brown on it. Normally, even with bleaching, I have very healthy hair! But, my hair took on some damage, more than I like or that I’m used to. This stuff is AMAZING. makes my hair feel great. Helps my ends so much! Smells really good too! A lot of products make my hair look greasy/dirty, this does not! Even if I over spray. Definitely worth the money! Buy it, you won’t be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan McGarrity

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this product for this great price. This is the real deal. Sadly, I have found my fair share of counterfeit hair products on Amazon, but this this not one of those. My curls depend on It's 10 for soft, silky curls. This also works as an amazing detangled too! Love the scent as well.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyFam10

customer_reviews.title: Finally Discovered What Healthy Hair is Like
customer_reviews.text: I was having a lot of issues with hair breakage and split ends. My little sister who also uses this product recommended it to me and it has made all the difference. This product has been so helpful at keeping my hair healthy. When attempting to recommend it to coworkers and friends, I found out that many people were already using it and loved it also. I have fairly fine hair and this has been great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: SOFT,
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! Throughout the years I’ve tried several different products. NOTHING compares to THIS!!! My hair is so silky and healthy. I recently transitioned to blond highlights and hair is just as healthy if not healthier than it was when it was dark. My hair dresser started using the product on me before blow dries. I fell in love!!!I wash my hair at night and then spray in after towel drying, sleep and wake up the next morning and blow dry. This gives the product time to seep in and of course less heat on the hair. I highly recommend, go ahead and throw out everything else you’ve been using. :)
customer_reviews.author: Apellegrini25

customer_reviews.title: product has the most revolting smell
customer_reviews.text: whatever I received smells worse than the dumpster at my apartment complex on a hot day before garbage pickup! that's right: this smells worse than a pile of garbage that's been fermenting for a week. unless you need to induce vomiting because you accidentally a whole poisonous mushroom, I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Diluted Product-Very watery!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What I received is too watery to be the real thing. I’ve used this product for several years and it’s not normally thin enough to pour out with complete ease. It may have started as the real stuff but it’s been diluted to where you have to use a lot. I suggest just buying the real stuff, it will actually last a lot longer and you will notice a difference in your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It keeps hair shiny with body. Can’t live without it.
customer_reviews.text: I have found nothing like this . It is 10 because it really helps hair shine and conditions. Don’t buy generic brands of this there is nothing that compares. I especially, like using it a day or two after shampooing , apply again and it fluffs your hair back into your stlye.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Bootleg
customer_reviews.text: Smells completely different from my other bottle that I bought from the store. Also is very oily and heavy on your hair, flattens me out and does not control the fizz! Does the exact opposite of what its supposed to do! Now I'm scared to think about what I have actually been spraying on my head!!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Works on thin, fine hair too
customer_reviews.text: My hair is extremely thin and fine, and every time I wash it I get a crazy amount of tangles. This is the only product that helps me get the tangles out more easily without weighing my hair down. I used to have huge chunks of my hair come out when I combed it after shampooing and conditioning, not as much anymore! It comes in a spray bottle and seems to be like the consistency of a thinner conditioner, I hate to say watered down because I don't think it is, but that's what it feels like. I'm so glad my cousin introduced this product to me. And it smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ON BIRACIAL CURLS
customer_reviews.text: works wonders on my 12 y.o. daughters curls after the shower... She is Italian, Black & Native American... She has ringlet curls that tangle easily and this helps out a GREAT DEAL after washing & conditioning. Assists beautifly in detangling & moisturizing & is very beneficial in between washes. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT for all those that are looking for a product that actually works well for most hair types, especially multiracial ethnic hair.
customer_reviews.author: DMLandon7420

customer_reviews.title: Worked great... until it didn't!
customer_reviews.text: I bought "Its A 10" about a month ago, but didn't actually try it until just a couple days ago. I used it the first day with no problem, but this morning the spray nozzle totally stopped working. It will not pump at all! 😞 This morning I unscrewed the lid a put it in the palm of my hand to apply, but this is not at all what I want to do the rest of the time! I'm frustrated. I believe that I REALLY like the product itself. Can someone help?!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: too heavy for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is probably better for people with thicker or coarser hair... I have fine hair so it just gets weighed down. I spray on my hands before applying to help with this... but even then it can make my hair look unwashed after drying, whether I airdried or blowdried.
customer_reviews.author: Caitriona Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Best hair product EVER
customer_reviews.text: These It’s a Ten products are fantastic. I have long, fine hair and this product in particular is my favorite. If you spray it on your hands, it almost feels greasy but it’s actually very light and does not weigh hair down or make it look oily in any way. My hairdresser always uses this product and I have learned it gives that “fresh from the salon” look. It works wonders on little girls tangles too. It’s a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I usually purchase at salon, but ordered online this time instead. I ordered a 10 oz. bottle, but received five - 2 oz. bottles. Each had a $9.99 sticker placed over "Free Sample- Not for Resale" stamp on bottle. Little odd......probably won't order again....
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY A DAY

customer_reviews.title: Slightly thick
customer_reviews.text: Thicker than I expected, tends to gum up in the bottle, every morning's first "spray" comes out like a glob, then it starts to spray normally. Not sure if that's how the product is (I never had that issue with the ones I bought in stores), or if there was an idsue during manufacturing or transport. It still seems to work, though
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Favorite de-tangler!
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair that tangles and knots easily. I was pulling so much out when I would comb my hair after washing it. Someone recommended this and I've been using for years now! I have medium to long hair, towel dry, 5 spritzes, wait then comb/brush more easily (starting at the ends and working way up). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: It’s a 10 is my key to happy hair!
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best consigned I’ve ever found for my thin, fragile, curly hair. A couple spritz’s and my brush glides trough without breaking or tangling my waist length curly hair. When it dries, my hair is a froth of soft ringlets that my dear husband loves.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri P Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: -click helpful if helpful- I use this product on a daily basis. It smells so good and makes my hair so soft without looking greasy. It just takes about two sprays into damp hair before brushing it and that’s it. The large bottle lasts about a two or three months for me and I use it after every shower and sometimes in my daughters hair too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dry Damaged hair ? BUY ME
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best product I have used. Was recommended to me by a hairstylist that didn't cut/color my hair (had nothing to gain). Does not leave my hair greasy and has improved its overall condition. I have tried several products before such as healthy sexy soy, opalex, aragon oil, coconut oil, the list goes on. Worth every penny !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have wavy hair and this product is a great detangler and it protects my hair. I started using it when I was highlighting my hair which dried it out and it has since helped make my hair healthy again. I use it everyday and highly recommend it if you care about protecting your hair.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love this product. We have completely opposite hair, mine is baby fine straight & long, hers is super thick & curly. Makes both of our hair look shiny yet soft and the smell isn't bad either. Best detangler I ever used, works good on wet & dry hair. Do not have to use that much product at a time so it takes awhile to use up a whole bottle making it worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Really good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It’s the absolutely best stuff I’ve found for my thin frizzy hair. It doesn’t weigh it down or leave it crispy or oily looking. Yes, these are real problems. I wish I had perfect hair, but I look all over for this because I just haven’t found anything else as good except 12 Benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fine thin hair
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product and this is the cheapest you can find it, even compared to the Walmart price. I have thin blonde hair and this is the best leave in product I have come across that helps with breakage and detanlge. I used to buyer the smaller bottle but I just kept reordering so I opted for the large bottles now.
customer_reviews.author: erin helton

customer_reviews.title: Received used not sealed bottle
customer_reviews.text: The product came , it did not have a seal on the cap . It was most definitely used and resold .... only 3/4 filled . When this product comes new in the store you can squeeze bottle gently and product comes to the top ..... this was used , resold not full . For $33 this is a shame
customer_reviews.author: Renee D.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for my hair and it helps detangle and moisturize. I have very thin hair that I color, blow-dry, straighten and curl all the time. You can put it in wet or dry and it works great either way.
customer_reviews.author: bdrawls12

customer_reviews.title: Soft hair
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this stuff. When used as instructed, it makes my hair 10x softer and smoother than if I don't use it before blow drying. 9/10 would reccomend, would be a 10 except for it's a little pricey. But then again, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Krash :) * * VOTE!! * * 11-3-2020 * *

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product line and smells great too!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product and actually a few other It's a 10 products and love them all. I have thin hair, but a lot of it and as I've gotten older it has become a little frizzy (an outcome of some grey hairs!) and this product keeps my hair soft, smooth and smelling great! I can't live without it! Try their shampoo, conditioner and deep conditioner, you'll love them too!
customer_reviews.author: Harvest Crush

customer_reviews.title: Not the original. GROSS smell
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite things about "It's a 10" is how nice it smells. Well, much to my dismay, what I received instead of the pictured original product was some nasty "special edition scent" version. It reeks of men's cologne. If this ugly bottle were a person, it would be some hairy-chested slime-ball named Rico Suave with his shirt unbuttoned half way and chunky gold chains around his neck. He would be catcalling women on the street and running a switchblade comb through his slicked-back curly hair. So gross!
customer_reviews.author: H. Tsui

customer_reviews.title: The real deal ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I will never use another leave in product outside of this one. After washing my hair I put this in it, before blow drying and styling with serum/oil & flat iron. It detangles, it makes my hair softer, helps protect it, and it doesn’t make it feel heavy or greasy or anything. It’s just amazing. My order was authentic, and it’s my 2nd time purchasing this from Amazon, not a 3rd party. That way if you have an issue you can return it for free, no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: kkTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I like the product but when it came it was 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very strange. I like the product but when it came it was 10 1 ounce bottles of sample size (not for resale) versions. I was going to give this to my sister as a present but now it makes me look cheap like I didn't pay for the sample!
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: Best Detangler EVER
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE It's a 10 Miracle Leave-In Treatment!! I use it on myself and my daughter. I am caucasian and have fine blonde hair, but my daughter is biracial (African-American & Caucasian) with ringlets and tight waves. This is the only product I have found that truly detangles and performs as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Way more than a 10-
customer_reviews.text: Ten products are the bomb. My hair was extremely damaged when I started using the leave in product and the silk conditioner. The difference is day and night. My hair was actually crispy. It had been fried by using heat and hair dyes. I could not comb through it without pieces breaking off and falling all over me. Now, my hair is bouncy and shiny again. I love this product, and I use it daily. It is more than a 10!
customer_reviews.author: DKing

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive here than in Ulta!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and the cream conditioner from Ulta and it was so expensive. I was thrilled to see this product available here on Amazon in a larger amount, both products were available, and both were a better value.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Brunnmeier

customer_reviews.title: Detangler for adults
customer_reviews.text: I have long, thick, hair and oftentimes, this is the ONLY product that can help get through my tangles. I swear by it. It’s to the point where I panic if I’m traveling without it because I know brushing will be a nightmare. Must have for thick and tangled hair!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang for The Buck!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tea-tree oil is usually not cheap stuff. This bottle should last the year though. My daughter have very fine hair, and just started 1st grade this year - in order to NEVER have to go through a delousing procedure, cuz... EWWWW we are using this oil every night and her hair is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Nickell

customer_reviews.title: It really is a miracle leave in product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a god send! It works for so many different things and it actually does what it says it does. It never leaves my hair feeling or looking greasy or oily at all. It works amazing as a heat protector for the blow dryer and it's detangling abilities are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hair!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this product because it does just about everything you could want, it’s nongmo, it’s not greasy (my hair gets soooo greasy super easily), and the bottle lasts 3+ months of every day use on LONG hair. It’s a little on the expensive side but y’all, it lives up to the hype!
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff on earth
customer_reviews.text: Im a guy with long curly frizz shoulder length hair so when its humid out, this stuff works great last 10 years, smells amazing too even after a hard days work or out on the water in the hot summer sun
customer_reviews.author: J. Sidwell

customer_reviews.title: Great product - unusable bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Thought I was being smart buying this larger size. Big mistake. Bottle is unwieldy. Haven’t even been using it since it’s such a pain to use. One of these days I’ll pour it into another container but for now I’m defaulting to leftovers of other products.
customer_reviews.author: S. Laughrey

customer_reviews.title: The best leave in conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a little pricey so sometimes when I run out I try to find a cheaper alternative but I always come back to this. It makes my hair easy to comb through and it keeps it so much healthier than without it.
customer_reviews.author: HoorayForCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for frizz, curls and dryness
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. I spray it in hair after washing, before I blow dry it. My hair has no frizz, waves and curls are easy to hot iron straight, the style stays much longer, and the hair looks soft and manageable without looking like it has product in.
customer_reviews.author: parenteacher

customer_reviews.title: Where has this product been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I have interesting hair- the kind of hair that can break hairbrushes when using them. (Seriously- I break all of my brushes!!!) I have purchased probably every detangler and leave-in conditioner under the sun but didn't like the results of others. Some left my hair too greasy, others made my hair feel like straw. I'm seriously in love with this product- After spraying it in my hair, I could run my fingers through. THAT NEVER HAPPENS!!!! My hair feels like silk and after using it once, my coworkers kept complimenting how healthy my hair looked, asking if I got a cut or color. So amazed with this product and so happy I listened to the other reviews on here.
customer_reviews.author: S. Elison

customer_reviews.title: Best Detangler Ever
customer_reviews.text: It’s a 10 is the only treatment that helps with my tangly hair. It makes it soft and easy to brush. I’ve tried many other products and finally found something effective. I’ve been using it for years and spray it on my hair right after I wash it. I wouldn’t want to use anything else on my curly, unruly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: I've used it on dry hair but it works MUCH better on damp hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have VERY thin hair. I use it after washing my hair and after the mousse application. It keeps my hair more shiny and soft. During times if I didn't get a chance to wash my hair, I wet it down with fingertips then apply about 5 sprays into my damp hands and massage into my damp hair. It revitalizes my hair especially where my CPAP machine mask mashes it down.
customer_reviews.author: Helen from Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: This does not seem to be the actual productbthat we would buy at the salon. In fact the ingredients do not match on the label. That being said the cheaper price should have been a red flag. Deffinently did not perform as the product should.
customer_reviews.author: 2007FXD

customer_reviews.title: SInce trying this product - I'm never looking back
customer_reviews.text: Hair products are very personal and different for everyone. This works perfect for my hair and my lifestyle. Low maintenance. Shower - spray - brush - put in a bun...and then later when I take it down, it's perfect. It also air dries perfect too. Long story short...I'm never going back to mousse.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best hair product
customer_reviews.text: I spray this miracle leave-in product every time I wash my hair to help style it. I have been using it for several years now. It helps detangle my hair, and is a MUST with my hair styling routine. It has thermal protection built in, and helps add volume as well. I highly recommend this product to anyone who needs something to detangle and style their hair!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Has given my hair new lease on life
customer_reviews.text: Really good deal when you buy two.. Unable to find this particular one at the store. I am elderly and my hair has for years been fly-away and no life. I tried different conditioners, no luck. I apply this stuff liberally and the contrast in the appearance from before I was using it is night vs day. I would try to disguise my hair and keep it out of sight, now I feel comfortable. I love how it detangles, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: It's a 10 products are great.
customer_reviews.text: Great leave in conditioner. I have long, fine hair and use this after I shampoo and it makes it easy to comb and leaves my hair silky soft. I have been using this for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver for my hair. After all the coloring, spraying a generous amount on just my ends after showering keeps my hair not only smelling good, but feeling healthy. I can’t go a day without using this. Tip: Make sure you spray after shower while still damp and brush right away. If your hair is too dry it will be hard to brush and will feel like your hair is almost dirty with residue
customer_reviews.author: Daryenne

customer_reviews.title: I have average hair - not thick and not fine, that has a lot of texture and kink ...
customer_reviews.text: I have average hair - not thick and not fine, that has a lot of texture and kink to it, but not a consistent texture that I can go without styling it. I love this product and I have tried so many. It doesn't leave my hair feeling greasy or filmy or like it is coated with something. My hair feels very soft and it is much easier to blow dry it. I also like that I only need to use this product and not multiple other things. My hairdresser (who has been doing my hair for almost 20 years) noticed that my hair looked healthier and better styled too.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Daly

customer_reviews.title: Smooths out the tangles after washing your hair.
customer_reviews.text: My hair is always a tangled mess after washing, even though I use a conditioner too. I noticed my hairdresser applied this on my hair after towel drying it, and when she blow dried my hair and brushed it, there weren't major tangles to comb through. In fact, it was good that there was no pulling or anything. I asked where she got it from and so I bought the large size (more economical) and will buy more when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! My hair is very dry and brittle from bleaching it alot. So I started using this after every shower before I brush my hair out and OMG my hair is so much silkier and the tangles just brush right out. I went from losing a full brush of hair a day to only a few strands. It's very nice and I already notice my hair getting thicker from the lack of hair loss 😄
customer_reviews.author: Kay S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Detangler!
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this for years. When I was bleach blonde it was the only product that worked to detangler my freshly washed hair. I also use it on a friend's multicultural hair that's VERY curtly and typically unmanageable. Additionally, it doesn't weigh hair down. Ive only used it on towel dried hair, but nonetheless, I have stopped wasting money searching for the perfect product. . Its right here!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Eh, not that great. Confused about these reviews
customer_reviews.text: I really don't understand the awesome reviews of this product. I have fairly normal hair, but it can be a tiny bit dry sometimes, so I thought maybe this would be great for that and whatever else benefits - i don't even think I checked, just wanted to try it based on the reviews. I'm actually coming out of this quite confused as I feel like plenty of other products do exactly the same thing and even for cheaper. It certainly wasn't a miracle for me. I saw someone posting about watered down ones being shipped - maybe I had that issue, i don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Wing

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years. Helps me to comb out my long hair. Even after deep conditioning during a shower. My hair can be difficult to comb through. Spraying this stuff on wet hair helps so much.
customer_reviews.author: kristen laing

customer_reviews.title: Anti curls
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever for my daughter long hair to help them keep them strait and avoid curls. This product was recommended by our hair stylist, they have it to for sale just as at Publix but are way cheaper on Amazon! Our daughter is half White half black.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: The product it self. Miracle 10 is the best.
customer_reviews.text: My hair it’s a great product. Plus it arrived in few days. It really helps my hair grow strong an full. I love it will order again next month. I used it all my family members hair. Thank you so very much. Ms I White
customer_reviews.author: sonja juanita white

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair that mats and tangles immediately whenever its wet. Before this I had to wait until it was dry to brush it out because I would break and damage my hair. This has been the only product I've ever used to not only de-tangle my hair, but not leave it feeling greasy and oily. It has a scent but its not overwhelming or lingering. I will absolutely buy this again! Cant recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Better hair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes this product. It does help to keep her hair smooth and soft. When she flat irons her hair, which is often, her hair still looks soft. I started to use the product to help my curls to look nice and curly with much less frizz. This is a versatile wonderful hair product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I have been using this product in my hair for years and I have never had an issues. It helps to keep my hair moisturized without making it greasy.
customer_reviews.author: SHERENE PACE

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy this Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is junk, not the real product, smells different from real product, does not protect hair, clogs the sprayer, won't spray right My hair is damaged from assuming that this is the actual product, this fake version does not protect from heat damage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great conditioner and all in one product for your hair
customer_reviews.text: I cannot live with out this product. It is a must have in my morning routine for my hair. makes combing, drying, and styling so much easier and feels like it is moisturizing my hair as I apply. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. By far my favorite leave in conditioner I have ever tried. I have color treated blonde, relatively thin hair, and this works with minimizing frizz and keeping my hair soft and tangle free. Would recommend buying the larger bottle because it is so much cheaper for the price. I use the big bottle once every other day and it lasts me around 3-4 months!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Demarchi

customer_reviews.title: Magical product
customer_reviews.text: Can’t live without this stuff. I have super tangly hair after the shower and after a couple sprays the brush glides right through. Also leaves my hair smelly and looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Extra Moisture
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Got in here for about $25 in target it’s almost double. Very moisturizing. Keeps frizziness at bay. I use when I dry natural to keep cults conditioned and when I blow dry straight. The whole line is great.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, introduced to my when having my hair cut.
customer_reviews.text: Pump its contents with about eight dabs onto your head of hair after a shower, and then comb it in so it spreads. As it drys to holds your hair in place naturally, with no notice anything was ever added like one finds with hair sprays. If your hair gets messed up, just run a dampened comb through it. It's not a product that holds your hair in place as your drive around in your car with the windows open. But when you get to where you're going, just run a damp comb through your hair to return to a natural look. And if you leave it in, you'll notice your pillow doesn't show any stains.
customer_reviews.author: TriedandTrue

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hair product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I’ve used it for years and will continue to use it. It provides extra moisture for my hair without making it feel or look greasy. It has an amazing, clean scent that I love. I’ve even started using it on day 2 as a pick me up. It detangles my hair and makes it feel and smell fresh!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: My favorite leave on conditioner by far. I have a lot of hair but it is fine and tends to matte together. This has been a great solution for my easy to tangle hair. This product does not leave it felling greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Normally I love this product, but this bottle has many problems. The sprayer doesn’t work . I tried it on a different prod and it worked fine. The problem is with the product itself. It seems too this to spray and leaves my hair looking oily and dirty. Again, I believe that is only this particular bottle. I would buy again, but at a retail store.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Russo

customer_reviews.title: 100 score
customer_reviews.text: I can’t not say more than this is really a miracle product!! Love, love love it! Is amazing. Brought back my hair to life! Is really a must have. I have curly hair and I straighten my hair with blow dryer and hot iron But even leaving it curly it really Moisturize and leave my hair healthy and manageable. Can’t leave/ live without it!! I’ll give a 100 score!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: SO SAD
customer_reviews.text: this seller put something else in the bottle .. my hair was sticky for and I figured it out it was whatever they put in the bottle to replace the It's a 10 ... I love Its A 10 products but will never trust the seller on here again
customer_reviews.author: Msdebby

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I am disposed. It is too expensive and could have gotten better protection for my hair at Safeway grocery store, with a product half the cost. It is heavy and not a great detangler. As for drying time, I see no difference between using the product and not using it.
customer_reviews.author: tracy kasamoto

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! Leaves hair smooth, silky and healthy looking. My 13 year old niece came to visit and used mine and liked it. I surprised her by sending her a bottle. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Something is not right. Blow drying my hair then added this product to my hair, my hIr felt gooey, sticker and wouldn’t dry. I don’t believe this is it’s a 10!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but cost prohibitive.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, but hate the price. Was more cost effective when it first came out. Tough to justify the cost. Tends to thicken too much towards the end. I just add a tiny bit of water to thin it out. Seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: dbancroft

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to buy
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick curly as a guy, with my current haircut being shorter on the sides and little longer on top to do a sort of natural comb over. This product has been amazing for me, and I will continue to use it until they change the formula. I have used this product solo as a styling product (coat hair while slightly damp after a shower), as well as applying a light amount to damp hair before putting in a different product on top that will give my hair more of a style and hold. I've noticed in the last month that my hair is much smoother and softer, with less dandruff and frizz. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Sean c

customer_reviews.title: great but broke.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I used it about 5 times and the sprayer stopped spraying. I contacted the manufacturer and they said they don't honor replacement sprayers from Amazon so now the product is very hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wemple

product_meta.title: It's a 10 Haircare Miracle Leave-In product, 10 fl. oz. (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description:
Size:10 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)It's a 10 Miracle Leave-In Product: 1. Inhibits dry, damaged hair 2. Adds shine 3. Detangles 4. Controls frizz 5. Seals & protects hair color 6. Helps prevent split ends 7. Stops hair breakage 8. Creates silkiness 9. Enhances natural body 10. Flat iron spray & thermal protection STYLING TIP: Apply product to wet hair before blow drying or styling, or use on dry hair instead of styling cream for smooth, controlled hair.

BRAND STORY
It's a 10 Haircare is an established, professional hair care line offering exceptional products worldwide that include exceptional 10-in-1 multi-purpose products for the best hair experience possible.
feature_bullets: NOURISHING: Our Miracle Leave-In Conditioner spray is a great addition to your daily hair care routine to help leave dull, damaged hair in the past and rejuvenate natural oils. This multi-purpose product is great to be used as a detangler as well as a restorative styler
PREVENT SPLIT ENDS AND BREAKAGE: Helps protect against heat damage while smoothing, styling and/ or controlling frizz
VOLUMIZING: Keep your hair's natural body while adding shine and leaving your hair feeling soft, silky, and bouncy
SAFE FOR COLORED HAIR: Seals and protects hair color while acting as a natural sunscreen to help guard against color fading and/ or brassiness while in the sun

NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Our Miracle Leave-In Conditioner Spray is full of natural ingredients, such as sunflower seed and green tea leaf extract and silk amino acids, to help bring out all hair types’ natural luster and shine
